scripts.build: npm run build:systemjs && npm run build:sjs
scripts.min: npm run min:systemjs && npm run min:sjs
scripts.min:systemjs: cd dist && terser system.src.js -cm --source-map content=system.src.js.map --comments "/SystemJS v/" -o system.js
scripts.min:sjs: cd dist && terser s.src.js -cm --source-map content=s.src.js.map --comments "/SystemJS v/" -o s.js
scripts.footprint: npm run footprint:systemjs && npm run footprint:sjs
scripts.test: npm run test:systemjs && npm run test:sjs
scripts.prepublish: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run min
